pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pinit## an application for creating shortcut for apps and scripts ( only for linux )## installation- using pip :run this two commands in terminal :```bashpip install pinitpinit install```or run :```bashpip install pinit && pinit install```<!-- - appimage : --><!-- just download pinit.AppImage file and run it -->## commands- pinit- pinit install- pinit uninstall- pinit upgrade- pinit upgrade --force
